_instructions: This file contains all my work experience. Edit this file to add,
remove, or update your professional experience on my portfolio.
IMPORTANT: This is a JSON file. Be careful with commas!
- Each experience needs a comma after it EXCEPT the last one
- Each field needs a comma after it EXCEPT the last one in that experience
- id: A unique identifier (any text, no spaces)
- description: Array of key highlights/achievements (bullet points)
- logo: Path to company logo (put images in assets/companies/)
TO ADD AN EXPERIENCE: Copy one of the examples below and modify it
TO REMOVE AN EXPERIENCE: Delete the entire {...} block (and fix commas)

experiences.title: Master of Science in Data Science
description: Pursuing advanced coursework in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Applied Machine Learning, and Functional Genomics
Developed multimodal UMAP project for dual-UMAP alignment using GSE140203 SHARE-seq dataset with 34,774 mouse skin cells
Built crash-resistant preprocessing pipeline handling both RNA expression and chromatin accessibility data
Implemented DQN agent for Pokemon battles and comprehensive AI skincare consultant application using RAG pipelines with LangChain and OpenAI's API
Utilized Google Cloud TPU credits for collaborative machine learning projects
Completed extensive work on regression analysis, geospatial data analysis, and algorithms coursework

experiences.title: Associate Business Process Analyst
description: Designed and implemented a Python/Snowflake Email Alerting System monitored data pipeline status, providing stakeholders with real-time failure notifications (including job names and timestamps) in under 120 seconds, reducing data downtime.
Architected a centralized GBS Snowflake stage environment to consolidate data from multiple sources, streamlining access to vital business metrics for reporting and analysis.
Developed automated ThoughtSpot dashboards to visualize key GBS metrics and perform daily source-to-target comparisons, boosting data integrity and enabling real-time error detection.
Constructed an ML classification framework in Python to programmatically identify and correct erroneous Ultimate Parent Code assignments and customer-site matches in MDM data.

Delivered actionable data quality intelligence by automating detection of critical One Customer data inaccuracies, enabling proactive corrections and ensuring 90% data reliability before errors reached customers.

experiences.title: Associate Data Engineer
description: Led large-scale data integrity initiatives for SQL Server and SAP migrations to Snowflake by developing Python automation scripts to validate millions of records.
Engineered a data reconciliation system automatically compared data using primary key joins, precisely identifying and reporting all mismatched records and exact data variances.

Dramatically accelerated bug-resolution timelines for data quality, reducing issue resolution from 2-3 days to 4-5 hours during Snowflake migrations by providing developers with precise primary keys and discrepancy details.
Automated complex testing for SAP-to-Snowflake Supply Chain pipelines, ensuring 98% data accuracy across all transformation layers.
Enhanced migration speed and reliability by establishing an end-to-end computerized validation process, eliminating need for manual record-by-record checks.

experiences.title: Data Engineering Intern
description: Designed and built a regression automation tool in Python to validate data transformations across Snowflake layers (ILA, ILB, Base Model).
Delivered a key internship project having enhanced data quality assurance and was submitted as a final university thesis. Internship project covered 50% of final semester grade.

experiences.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
